# refuge

`refuge` provides access to the [Refuge Restrooms API](https://www.refugerestrooms.org/api/docs/#!/restrooms) in R.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("evanodell/refuge")
```

## Use

```{r}
library(refuge)

bathrooms <- rfg_location(lat=39, lng=-75)

tibble::glimpse(bathrooms)

```
